resources.string: Do you want to clear all scans permanently?
Hi, checkout this awesome app which makes reading easy by finding jargon word meanings for you in just a snap.\n*Download*: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.binayshaw7777.readbud
Do you want to this scan permanently?

ReadBud is an Android app used to extract jargon with its meaning from scanned images of a book or any form of text. It comes in handy when you\'re a beginner or want to save time by skipping the process of word meaning search on the Internet or any Dictionary

The purpose of this app is very simple and straightforward. To use this app you only need Camera access. Start by clicking picture(s) of your pages from any book and save it. Open your saved scan and read the text extracted via OCR (ML-Kit) and click on the highlighted words (Jargon) to display their meaning on your screen. So simple, isn\'t it?
Click on the Floating Action Button on the Bottom Right side of your screen in Homepage
Click on the the Camera Icon on the Bottom Right of your screen and click an image of a page containing texts
Repeat the same process if you want to add multiple images, else you can save by click on Top Right button (Tick mark)
Once you save, it should appear on Homepage, by clicking any scanned document, it will take you to the Book View Page where you can view the texts with their meanings
Click on the highlighted texts to get their meaning, also you can click on the speaker icon to invoke TTS (Text to speech
No saved scans\nClick on the camera button to scan
No records found\nClick on the \(+\) button to add
No Text found in the Image
Note: The definition generated by ReadBud is fetched from an offline Dictionary which might be irrelevant sometimes. In future updates you can search more appropriate definition online
